thread.title: Ats

author: Ats
title: Ats
text: I ordered relative pricy Maurice Lacroix watch and my worries - is it original, is it trustful supplier, will it be shipped oversea, what if payment disappear etc. But everything were arranged great. Shipment was ontime in Europe and as well documents were cleared well to arrange custom procedures. Last one was actually surprisingly easy. I would recommend the shop for everyone!
